experiencesData.title: Hubar Tech Ltd
description: Hubar Tech is a software development company that specializes in Telecoms Software. It is a sister company of UK-based Exos Systems Ltd.

Create and maintain essential components inside the Redux and React Typescript frontend framework, which are essential to the functionality of the overall project. Working collaboratively with developers, designers, and product managers, we can ensure that user-centric design principles and diversity are prioritized in our development efforts by advocating for and implementing best practices in web accessibility.

highlights.title: Point of Sale (POS) System
highlights.detail: : With cutting-edge technology, our Point of Sale (POS) System redefines transactions. By seamlessly incorporating state-of-the-art technologies, it improves customer experiences, expedites processes, and boosts productivity, completely changing the retail environment for both customers and enterprises.

highlights.title: Process Control Management (PCM) System
highlights.detail: : The PCM system streamlines procedures, reduces errors, and increases production for companies in a variety of industries, improving operational efficiency.

highlights.title: Electronic Bill (E-Bill) System
highlights.detail: : The E-Bill System simplifies billing processes, enabling electronic invoicing, payments, and record-keeping, fostering efficiency and convenience for businesses and customers.

highlights.title: My-care App
highlights.detail: : The My-care App is a mobile application that provides a variety of telecommunication services, including mobile top-ups, bill payments, and more, all in one convenient location. It is a one-stop shop for all of your telecommunication needs.

projects.title: knock knock
projects.description: Excited to share my latest project! Implemented secure user authentication with JSON Server Auth, efficient real-time data fetching using RTK Query, and seamless navigation with private/public routes and login persistence. Enhanced user experience with Infinite Scroll for continuous content updates, along with advanced cache updates for smooth and responsive interactions.

projects.title: EXOS Systems Ltd
projects.description: This project is a modern, responsive website for a EXOS System Ltd, designed to showcase services, portfolio, and company information. The website is built using Tailwind CSS for a utility-first approach to styling, and Vanilla JavaScript for dynamic interactions. The project setup uses Vite, ensuring a fast and efficient development environment with lightning-quick hot module reloading (HMR) and optimized builds.

projects.title: T-Shirt Customization
projects.description: This is the t-shirt customization project. Using this site you can design your t-shirt as you want. You can change the color, logo, structure and many more things. This is a very interesting project. I hope you will enjoy it.

projects.title: Portfolio Project
projects.description: This is the portfolio project. When I built this app I was a beginner in Frame Motion, Three JS and Maath. I learned a lot of things from this project. I hope you will enjoy it. I will be happy if you give me some feedback about this project. I will try to improve it. Thank you.

projects.title: Movie Site
projects.description: This is the movie site project. Using this site you can see the latest movies. You can see the movie details, rating, review and many more things. There I use free API to get movie list. I hope you will enjoy it.

projects.title: CRUD Operation
projects.description: This is the CRUD operation project. Using this site you can create, read, update and delete the data. There I use free API to get data and update the data. Also use JSON server to store the data. I hope you will enjoy it.
